name: Wimpod
description: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
abilities.description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
